UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Dissection of the antimicrobial and hemolytic activity of Cap18: Generation of Cap18 derivatives with enhanced specificity.
Literature.Author: Ebbensgaard A, Mordhorst H, Overgaard MT, Aarestrup FM, Hansen EB

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Lactococcus lactis subsp. lactis IL1403(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium LT2(MIC=8µg/ml),Yersinia ruckeri 392/2003(MIC=16µg/ml),Aeromonas salmonicida ATCC 33658(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32-64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes N22-2(MIC=16-32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>=64µg/ml)
